rules_text:
[i]Engage![/i] – {1}{U}{B} [i](You may put this card under another legendary creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)[/i]
[i]Keen Insight[/i] – Whenever Soren, Emblem of The Strategist engages or whenever you cast your second spell each turn, surveil 2. Then you may cast up to one instant or sorcery card from your graveyard this turn. If a spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.
